title: Thannilavu Theniraikka Lyrics Padithal Mattum Podhuma
stanzas:
Thannilavu Theniraikka
thaalai maram neer thelikka
kanni magal nadai
payindre sendraal
ilam kadhalanai kandu
naani nindraal.
naani nindraal.(2)

nenjam adhil alai ezhumba
thanjamalar adi kalanga
nenjam adhil alai ezhumba
thanjamalar adi kalanga

anji anji idai thuvala vandhaal
angu anbarullam thanai
ninaindhu nindraal
ninaindhu nindraal

minnalandha manam irukka
mannalandha adi edukka
ponnalandha udal
nadunga vandhaal
oru poovalandha
mugaththai kandu nindraal
kandu nindraal

pottiurkka poovirukka
pooththa malar manamirukka
pottiurkka poovirukka
pooththa malar manamirukka

kattilukku miga nerungi
vandhaal
iru kan vizhiyil
kavidhai kandu nindraal
kandu nindraal
